storyInfo: When Rosa is delivering comfort food to new patients, she encounters her former housemaid. The servant is puzzled by her current situation. Faced with the maid's confusion, Rosa chooses to explain herself through her actions.

attributes.content: Gummy, it's just us. So, be honest with me, what do you think?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You're… you're really serious about this?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Of course, it's very important to me.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Um... Alright.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You want me to be totally honest?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I assure you, I can take it.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Well... Actually, it's not bad.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Mhm. All in all, Rosa, you stick close to the recipe when you cook, so your dishes will taste fine.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Wonderful!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But at the same time, you might be sticking to the recipe a little too close.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Oh, what's wrong with that?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Cooks usually don't follow the recipe exactly. You're doing it all so carefully, it's not gonna make the food bad, but... it won't be really good either.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I see... no wonder I always feel like my cooking could never be as good as yours.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hehe, I've got so much experience, I've been tempered a thousand times over.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Rosa, that you can manage this much is already really good, you've definitely surpassed Zima.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: This is one arena I wouldn't be too happy about besting her.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Gummy, Rosa, is the food ready? The patients are almost done with their treatment.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh, Uncle Matterhorn! It's ready. Rosa and I will bring it out now.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Great, thanks.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Let's hop to it.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Right, I do hope this meal will lift their spirits.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hello, everyone!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hi, Gummy, what comfort food have you made the patients today?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: It's not my cooking this time, it's Rosa's!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Actually, I just needed an excuse to have Gummy teach me her culinary arts.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Let me tell you, Medic, Rosa worked really hard to make all these dishes extra tasty.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: And Master Chef Gummy is proud to have such a good student.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Sounds like Rhodes Island will soon have another chef.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: There's still so much I want to learn. Let's bring the patients their food for now.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: This way.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Judging by your accent, you're not Victorian, are you?
attributes.name: Lively Female Patient

attributes.content: *sigh* Don't bring it up. My husband was sick, so we went from Ursus to Victoria to get him treated.
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: He got better, but I ended up with this damnable Oripathy.
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: So, your husband…
attributes.name: Lively Female Patient

attributes.content: He didn't abandon me. He asked all around to find this place, he's the one who brought me here.
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: Then you're one of the lucky ones.
attributes.name: Lively Female Patient

attributes.content: Lucky?! You don't know, before he got sick, I worked as a maidservant to an important household. That's what I'd call lucky.
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: The patients are here, I'll help you serve the food.
attributes.name: Medic

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: Lady Natalya, is that Lady Natalya?
attributes.name: Chatty Female Patient

attributes.content: You… could you be Sofia?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yes, Sofia, I was your maid! Sofia!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: You're… That's right, I remember you left before the incident in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yes, yes, I had to get my deadbeat Alexey treated. That meant leaving the service of your house, and use the money I'd saved to take him to Victoria.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I heard what happened in Chernobog and I was so worried about you, I'm glad to see you're all right.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: But what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I…
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Oh, the House of Rostov owns this company! You must be in charge here, yes?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Lady Natalya, please show mercy to your sad, pitiful old maid.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Alexey had me running ragged. I never imagined I would catch Oripathy.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Please grant me your mercy, ask the people here to give me some more medicine. I want to live.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: No, I'm not in charge here, Sofia.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But, then, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Everyone in the room is watching them, Rosa realizes, and decides it's not the place to talk.
Rosa, I'll take it from here.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Yes... Thank you, Gummy.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Come with me, Sofia.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Step inside.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: My lady, is this...?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: This is my dorm room.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Dorm room? How can you live in a place like this?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Even our servants quarters were nicer than this!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I've grown used to it.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: No, no, no, you're noble, how could you be used to this barn?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: If His Serenity and the Countess knew, I can't imagine how devastated they would be!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: The House of Rostov has fallen, Sofia.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: It's... what?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: The Reunion Movement destroyed Chernobog, including her wealth and the dignity of her people.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You don't mean the Count and Countess are...?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: …No.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: In the aftermath, I sought news of my mother and father.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: They are not dead. They were luckier than me, and managed to escape Chernobog.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: In the contrary, they thought me dead, and made for another city. As it stands, they have put down roots in some city or other.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I-In that case, why would you stay on this ship?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: This is no place for you!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: You should be looking for His Serenity and the Countess!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: So long as they live, the House of Rostov can return to its former glory!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: If I intended to do that, I would have done it when I made it out.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But I don't intend to do that, the Natalya you knew is dead.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Here and now, I am just Rosa, the Rhodes Island operator.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Oh dear, I see what this is. You had an argument with your parents and ran away from home, didn't you?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Take it.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Ah, what's this...? Istina and I were discussing this one at the book club, The Brothers Dostoyev?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: What are you doing with it, Zima?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Anna dug it up for you and asked me to hand it over. She's out on a mission.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Girl, who gave you permission to speak to Lady Natalya in such a manner?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: There's no need for that, Sofia.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: No, my lady, trust me. Give an inch to these people who don't know their place and they'll gladly take mile after mile.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Girl, when presenting an item to your betters, you must offer it respectfully with both hands. What are you doing just dropping it on her?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Who the hell asked you?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: So vulgar! Looking at your clothes, you're a student of Peterheim Middle School?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Got a problem with that?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Are you are my lady's new maid? How can you possibly not know proper etiquette?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Wha? Say that again.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Heavens, my lady, I do recall you once said Peterheim Middle School dragged the character of Chernobog's students into the mud.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: And now you're reduced to taking one of their girls into your service.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Even if you refuse to return to Ursus, we must find a place more befitting of your status!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Hmph, she hasn't been a princess for a long time now.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Sigh, vulgar girl, you think just because you live in the same place as my lady, that makes you her equal?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Look at the book you just handed her, and the others on this shelf: opera, sheet music—
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Even in such an environment, my lady has kept her refined taste.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Do honestly believe that you and she are equals?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Ugh, so she's a noble, is that supposed to be badass or something?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I have served many nobles, I know what true nobility is.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: And I say Lady Natalya is the very picture of high nobility, the embodiment of it!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Wha?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: (Whispers) Let it go.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Don't forget, you've got shit to do today.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm well aware.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: What's that? My lady, please do let me help you with any work you may have.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Nothing too difficult. A teacher in a nearby village was injured, leaving the children without an instructor. I will go to substitute.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: What? My lady, how could you deign to do such a thing?!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Let me speak to the person in charge at once.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: How could they possibly expect you to do anything like that?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: No, Sofia, I volunteered for it.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hi, Miss Rosa!
attributes.name: Lively Student

attributes.content: Barney, is your father feeling better?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yeah! He told me to thank the Rhodes Island doctors!
attributes.name: Lively Student

attributes.content: You just do well in school, that will be all the gratitude we need.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Lively Student

attributes.content: Hi, M-Miss Rosa.
attributes.name: Timid Student

attributes.content: Ah, Taytay, you finally decided to come to school!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yes, Mum w-wanted me t-to give this to you to say th-ank y-you.
attributes.name: Timid Student

attributes.content: Herbs?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yes, I-I p-picked them yesterday.
attributes.name: Timid Student

attributes.content: Thank you—
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Oh, my lady, let me take them for you.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: This grass is filthy, you'll dirty your hands.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Little one, Lady Natalya is kind-hearted. But next time, you must bring a better gift to thank her.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: S-Sorry.
attributes.name: Timid Student

attributes.content: There's no need to say sorry, Taytay.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Sofia, please wait for me outside.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But, it's far too dirty in here. How could I let you teach in a place like this?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I'm ordering you to leave.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: …Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Rosa looks around at the simple and crude warehouse-turned-classroom. A dozen or so pairs of eyes watch her with either curiosity or surprise.
Sorry, children, that was rather embarrassing.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Let's begin today's lesson.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Now, if you would please turn to page sixty-seven in your textbooks—
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: *sigh*, what happened to you, my lady?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Hey, what's wrong with you? What're you doing hanging around here?
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: I am Lady Natalya's maid.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Natalya? Oh, you mean Miss Rosa, she told me her name before.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Yes, her.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: This is the first I've heard of her having a maid.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: That can't be right. If Miss Rosa was a noblewoman with servants, why's she out working for money?
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: What do you mean money?!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Yes, when our local teacher got hurt on a hunt and had to be treated at Rhodes Island, Miss Rosa heard we needed a substitute and took it upon herself to come.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: At first, we also thought she was a noblewoman keeping herself entertained. But after a couple days of teaching, we could tell she was the real deal, a fine teacher.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: So, we wanted to pay her.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: She said she wanted to earn enough to buy a thing. Turned out to be something called a piano?
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: A few days ago, she said she'd saved up enough for the piano, but she still comes in to teach.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: If you're her maid and she really is a noblewoman, then why is she here teaching?
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't have the wrong person?
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Impossible!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Lady Natalya is a noblewoman through and through!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: The blood of the House of Rostov runs in her veins, she's high born!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: You simple peasants couldn't fathom the life my lady used to live!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: That's enough, Sofia.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I could hear you talking from inside.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: My lady, how could you? How could you debase yourself like this?!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: You're the pride of the House of Rostov! You're defiling your own nobility!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Sofia!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I've tried to be patient with you, but this time you've gone too far.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Are desperately trying to prove my nobility because I really am noble, or because you want to prove that you're superior?!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I had a good life in the House of Rostov!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Every day, I only needed think of how best to serve the Count, the Countess, and you. The days were busy, but oh so fulfilling. In the evenings, I still had time to go to the theater.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Those were wonderful days!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Do you know how much I've suffered since I left the household?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I've had to work my fingers to the bone just to keep me and Alexey alive. And in the end, what do I have to show for it?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Just this damned Oripathy!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I can't imagine why you wouldn't want to go back to that life!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: All you have to do is go back to Ursus and you'll be a noblewoman again. All you have to do is let me go with you, and it can all go back to the way it was!
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Sofia... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But I didn't deserve that life.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: And you're the same, what could you have possibly done to deserve all the suffering you've endured?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I don't blame you for wanting to go back, because I took everything for granted myself.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: But—it's not right.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: This is something that needs to change.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: How do you say all of that so easily?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: If I don't deserve any of this, If I don't think I deserve any of this, then what am I supposed to do?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I don't know, my lady, I don't know. I'm going to die.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I'm sorry you had to see all of that.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I understand, she seems like a sad woman.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Could I please have my pay for today?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Of course, of course, I have it here.
attributes.name: Village Head

attributes.content: Rosa takes the bag from the village head and pours the coins into her own purse.
The purse bulges, it looks like she's gathered a small fortune.
Rosa hesitates for a moment, then walks up to Sofia and places the purse in her hand.
Sofia, take this, and go back.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: What's this...?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: A portion of my savings, enough to pay for your course of treatment.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: This is the all I can do for you, as your former master.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: For this day onward, you will not refer to me as 'my lady'. If I should return to Ursus one day, it will not be as a child of the House of Rostov.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I have a codename at Rhodes Island, I am—
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Rosa.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: You must also address me by this name, I'm just an operator here.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: M-My lady…
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: I still don't get understand.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: Why do you choose to live like this?
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: One day... you will understand.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: No, I will find out where the Count and Countess are. I'll send Alexey to tell them you're still alive.
attributes.name: Sofia the Former Maid

attributes.content: You can do what you think is best.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: However, when the time comes, I will be the one to make the choice.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Are you sure about this? You could use that money.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I told them what happened. Anna was worried about you, so she dragged me along with her.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: The money is gone, but I can earn more.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Of course, there are some things that must be done.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hmph, look at you acting all mature.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: It can't be helped. It's as I said, this is all I can do.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hello, what is it?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hey, Your Worship, you got a delivery. Real big sucker too.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Do you mean—
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Yep, your piano's here.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Better hurry back.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Zima, Istina, we have to go back, now!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: What's the rush? It's not going anywhere!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: But I can't wait!
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Ugh, the girl's barely got anything fancy in her at all anymore.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: And so she's become more and more likable.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Why are you taking her side too?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: I'm only stating facts.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I think it's working on you too, Sonya.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I don't like her.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Aw, hell, that piano cost a fortune. If she's gotta move it by herself, she could drop the damned thing and then it'll cost even more money to fix.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Better head back and help her.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Haha, sure.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Let's put it here.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Did you make space for the piano before?
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yes, after all, this is the most money I've spent since I came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I've thought about it every day.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I just don't get why the maid was so upset when she found out you bought a piano with money you made yourself.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Because if she recognized that I wasn't nobility, then she would lose someone she thought she could rely on.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: So she can rely on herself.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: That isn't easy to accept. You know how long it took me to figure it out.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I don't blame her. It's Ursus… No, it's the aristocracy, a powerful system that made her like this.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I hope that in the future, everyone can live by your words, Zima.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: So they can rely on themselves.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: If you did it, anyone can, right?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: And if they can't, I'll go help them figure it out.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Yes... help them figure it out.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Thinking on that... I believe I've found a reason to return to Ursus.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I don't get you. Always talking about the obvious stuff.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: And that's why I envy you, you always know what's obvious.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: …but I can't pretend I didn't hear what you said before.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: So when I told you I wanted to save up for the piano, you actually thought I couldn't do it?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: …I never said that.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hmph, you thought I was pamper and spoiled, that I couldn't press on.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: I think it works. Now if Your Worship started bouncing around like me after becoming an operator, that would be weird.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Your Worship is still a fancy girl.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Mhm, in any case, you did exchange your own labor for this piano.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: We all hoped you could do it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Yep yep, isn't that right, Zima?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: What are you looking at me for?
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: A valued member of our team just fulfilled her wish! You're our leader, so of course you've gotta congratulate her!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Uh, congrats.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Now then, fellow members of the Ursus Student Self-government Group, you will be my first audience.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Hooray, I've always wanted hear Rosa play!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Yes, I'm also looking forward to it.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Uh oh, when you say that, I feel a little shy.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: And it's been so long since I last played piano. You're not allowed to laugh at me if I'm not good.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: We won't!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: I wouldn't be able to tell anyway.
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: If you're gonna play, then play already.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Hmph, I didn't ask you two.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Rosa approaches the piano presses the keys. For a split second, she feels as if she's turned back into Natalya.

She sits in the center of an extravagant room, filled with distinguished guests attentively watching her performance. She need not worry about anything, she need only enjoy that simpler, more elegant time.
Although, this piano's tone isn't quite as good as the exquisite one she once owned—No, the one she never truly owned.
The piano's roughness drags her back to reality.
Now then, my dear friends, the piece I will be performing for you is—'Für Lorenz'.
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: The audience is only four girls, and the room is quite simple, and she has many worries.
The sound of the piano rings out, and it's somewhat rough.
But it's for the best.
She chose this, and she loves it.
